EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Greenplum Summit_NYC_Q119.GP Summit - 3/12/19
EmailTemplate.subject: Final week to register for Greenplum Summit at PostgresConf - March 19 NYC
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit?utm_source=pivotal-email-5&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-summit-2019]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Don’t run out of time! This is the last week to register and join the best minds in massively parallel processing (MPP), open source Postgres, and advanced analytics, all coming together for Greenplum Summit <[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit?utm_source=pivotal-email-5&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gp-summit-2019]]> at PostgresConf <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019]]> on March 19 in New York City.
Save 25% off your conference pass A single pass gives you full access to both PostgresConf and Greenplum Summit, and day passes are available, too! Get a 25% discount off registration <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/buytickets]]> with promo code “2019_GREENPLUM”.
Case studies, tech talks, training and more At Greenplum Summit, your peers will share their wisdom through use case presentations and deep-dive tutorials. Learn from Morgan Stanley, Purdue University, The European Space Agency, Baker Hughes, Conversant Media, Pivotal architects and data scientists, and more. Check out the complete Greenplum Summit agenda now <[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit#agenda]]>.
You can also get hands-on in our one-day Greenplum Database training session <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/program/proposals/petabyte-scale-data-warehousing-with-open-source-greenplum-database-daf8fb29-80d5-4cf7-969c-0d6535a2b3e4]]> on Monday, March 18.
After the Conference: “Reimagining Postgres in a modern application setting” [Webinar] We’ve scheduled a thought-provoking webinar for you as a follow up to PostgresConf. Join industry analysts Stephen O’Grady from Redmonk and me, Jacque Istok, on March 28 at 11 am PDT to learn what’s driving the most significant adoption of Postgres. Sign up here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-28-reimagining-postgres-in-a-modern-application-setting-webinar?utm_source=gpsummit&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=reimagine-postgres&utm_term=q119]]>.
I hope to see you there, Jacque
